value:
Princess Sharena really catches my
eye. That girl is as adorable as
she is formidable.$k$pI'd love to dress her up in a
spring-festival outfit!

The realm outside my family's castle
is very dark. So every spring, we
go all out to decorate our home.$k$pFlowers of all colors...bunnies of
all shapes and sizes...and more
eggs than you can imagine!

The spring festival always reminds
me to live a life of sweet ease,
$Nu.$k$pDo remember that you can lay
your weary head in my lap.

Care to dress up in one of these
festival outfits? It'd really suit you.
Oh, yes. Just too cute!

I adore strolling around here in
the spring. It's simply ideal—so
many flowers!

I've come with spring greetings...and
with jealousy for how close you are
with $Nf.

How glorious! I could jump for
joy!

Festival or not, I just can't help
growing by leaps and bounds!

Oh my... Is this outfit holding me
back in some way?

How sweet of you. Building me up
for summer, perhaps?

I'm Camilla, eldest princess of Nohr,
come dressed for the spring fest. But
it's rather tight, don't you think?

Did you want to celebrate the
spring festival with me today,
$Nu?$k$pDelighted to oblige. Shall I pop
some rabbit ears on your head?
Rest your head in my lap?$k$pNo one relaxes better than I do.
Back in my world, we lounge all day
in public baths. Or at least I do.$k$pOh, wouldn't it just be the icing on
the cake to luxuriate in such
steaming-hot water right now?$k$pHmm? That has nothing to do
with this festival? Well, leave it
to you to stay on task.$k$pGreat Hero of another world, you
have outmaneuvered me. I was
hoping we'd get a holiday together.$k$pI love to get away from it all with
members of my family—and I do
consider you family.$k$pThat means I'll also protect you as
I would a brother or sister, even if
you are my superior here.$k$pStill, if you ever grow weary and
need to get some sleep, remember
my lap is forever yours.
はっ！
うふふ
んもう！
You're a rough one...
Sweet dreams.
Let's celebrate!
Don't get carried away.
Spring is here!
Sprung...
My...
Shall we celebrate?
During the spring festival, egg delicacies are my everything back home.
What would a spring festival be without cute, wittle bunnies? Like me.
I'm rarely found in anything like this. But it's a special occasion.
I was painting eggs with my dear Corrin before coming to this realm.
My brother Xander... He's probably hidden eggs at our castle.
The arrival of spring always warms my heart. May we celebrate like this forever.
Well...
Beautiful!
Spring has sprung.
